role.argrole: thing arg0 is well aware of

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 因此)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 创业者)) (VP (VV 必须) (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (NP (NN 风险)) (CC 和) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 可能))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 失败))))) (VP (VV 了然於心)))))
example.arg: 对 风险 和 *OP* *T*-1 可能 的 失败
